text: Owen Goldin (born June 7, 1957) is an American philosopher and Professor of Philosophy at Marquette University. He is the President-elect of the Metaphysical Society of America. Goldin is known for his research on Aristotle's Posterior Analytics. ==Books== * Explaining an Eclipse: Aristotle's Posterior Analytics 2.1-10 (University of Michigan Press, 1996) ==References== Category:20th-century American philosophers Category:21st- century American philosophers Category:Philosophy academics Category:1957 births Category:Presidents of the Metaphysical Society of America Category:Living people Category:Marquette University faculty Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:University of Texas at Austin alumni Category:Commentators on Aristotle
title: Owen Goldin
